pullrequest.title: Allow release.py to use underscores in alias (for ignition-fuel_tools)

content.raw: Thanks a lot, @\_jrivero\_! We can get this in, but now it's not urgent anymore to get a release out. We'll add a couple of features and shoot for a release next week, and if it fails we can revisit this again.
content.html: Thanks a lot, @_jrivero_! We can get this in, but now it's not urgent anymore to get a release out. We'll add a couple of features and shoot for a release next week, and if it fails we can revisit this again.
